name: 3.redis
description: - Go to the link => https://github.com/tporadowski/redis/releases - Download the "msi" version - Install it - Go to C: -> program file -> Redis -> Copy the location path. C:\Program Files\Redis - Go to "control-panel" -> "User a/c" -> "User a/c" -> Change my environment variable ->  Double click on "path" -> "Click on new" -> Paste the above location path. [!Alt](./1.png)
